properties.entry: SELECT COUNT(*) count FROM BOARD WHERE BOARD_TYPE = 2 AND STATUS = 'Y'
SELECT COUNT(*) count FROM BOARD WHERE BOARD_TYPE = 1 AND STATUS = 'Y'

SELECT BOARD_NO, BOARD_TITLE, TO_CHAR(CREATE_DATE, 'YYYY-MM-DD') "CREATE_DATE", COUNT FROM BOARD B JOIN MEMBER ON (BOARD_WRITER = USER_NO) WHERE BOARD_TYPE = 1 AND B.STATUS = 'Y' ORDER BY BOARD_NO DESC

SELECT * FROM ( SELECT ROWNUM RNUM, A.* FROM ( SELECT BOARD_NO, BOARD_TITLE, USER_ID, TO_CHAR(CREATE_DATE, 'YYYY-MM-DD') "CREATE_DATE", COUNT FROM BOARD B JOIN MEMBER ON (BOARD_WRITER = USER_NO) WHERE BOARD_TYPE = 2 AND B.STATUS = 'Y' ORDER BY BOARD_NO DESC ) A ) WHERE RNUM BETWEEN ? AND ?
INSERT INTO BOARD ( BOARD_NO , BOARD_TYPE , BOARD_TITLE , BOARD_CONTENT , BOARD_WRITER ) VALUES ( SEQ_BOARDNO.NEXTVAL , 2 , ? , ? , ? )
UPDATE BOARD SET COUNT = COUNT+1 WHERE BOARD_NO = ?

SELECT BOARD_NO , BOARD_TITLE , BOARD_TYPE , USER_ID , TO_CHAR(CREATE_DATE, 'YYYY-MM-DD HH24:MI') "CREATE_DATE" , COUNT , BOARD_CONTENT , ( SELECT MAX(BOARD_NO) FROM BOARD WHERE BOARD_NO < ? AND STATUS = 'Y' ) "PREV_NO" , ( SELECT BOARD_TITLE FROM BOARD WHERE BOARD_NO = (SELECT MAX(BOARD_NO) FROM BOARD WHERE BOARD_NO < ? AND STATUS = 'Y') ) "PREV_TITLE" , ( SELECT MIN(BOARD_NO) FROM BOARD WHERE BOARD_NO > ? AND STATUS = 'Y' ) "NEXT_NO" , ( SELECT BOARD_TITLE FROM BOARD WHERE BOARD_NO = (SELECT MIN(BOARD_NO) FROM BOARD WHERE BOARD_NO > ? AND STATUS = 'Y') ) "NEXT_TITLE" FROM BOARD JOIN MEMBER ON (BOARD_WRITER = USER_NO) WHERE BOARD_NO = ?
UPDATE BOARD SET BOARD_TITLE = ? , BOARD_CONTENT = ? WHERE BOARD_NO = ?
SELECT COUNT(*) count FROM BOARD WHERE BOARD_TYPE = 2 AND STATUS = 'Y' AND BOARD_TITLE LIKE ?

SELECT * FROM ( SELECT ROWNUM RNUM, A.* FROM ( SELECT BOARD_NO, BOARD_TITLE, USER_ID, TO_CHAR(CREATE_DATE, 'YYYY-MM-DD') "CREATE_DATE", COUNT FROM BOARD B JOIN MEMBER ON (BOARD_WRITER = USER_NO) WHERE BOARD_TYPE = 2 AND BOARD_TITLE LIKE ? AND B.STATUS = 'Y' ORDER BY BOARD_NO DESC ) A ) WHERE RNUM BETWEEN ? AND ?
SELECT COUNT(*) count FROM BOARD WHERE BOARD_TYPE = 2 AND STATUS = 'Y' AND BOARD_TITLE LIKE ? OR BOARD_CONTENT LIKE ?

SELECT * FROM ( SELECT ROWNUM RNUM, A.* FROM ( SELECT BOARD_NO, BOARD_TITLE, USER_ID, TO_CHAR(CREATE_DATE, 'YYYY-MM-DD') "CREATE_DATE", COUNT FROM BOARD B JOIN MEMBER ON (BOARD_WRITER = USER_NO) WHERE BOARD_TYPE = 2 AND BOARD_TITLE LIKE ? OR BOARD_CONTENT LIKE ? AND B.STATUS = 'Y' ORDER BY BOARD_NO DESC ) A ) WHERE RNUM BETWEEN ? AND ?
SELECT COUNT(*) count FROM BOARD WHERE BOARD_TYPE = 2 AND STATUS = 'Y' AND BOARD_WRITER = (SELECT USER_NO FROM MEMBER WHERE USER_ID = ?)

SELECT * FROM ( SELECT ROWNUM RNUM, A.* FROM ( SELECT BOARD_NO, BOARD_TITLE, USER_ID, TO_CHAR(CREATE_DATE, 'YYYY-MM-DD') "CREATE_DATE", COUNT FROM BOARD B JOIN MEMBER ON (BOARD_WRITER = USER_NO) WHERE BOARD_TYPE = 2 AND BOARD_WRITER = (SELECT USER_NO FROM MEMBER WHERE USER_ID = ?) AND B.STATUS = 'Y' ORDER BY BOARD_NO DESC ) A ) WHERE RNUM BETWEEN ? AND ?
UPDATE BOARD SET STATUS = 'N' WHERE BOARD_NO = ?

SELECT REPLY_NO , REPLY_CONTENT , USER_ID , TO_CHAR(CREATE_DATE, 'YY-MM-DD HH:MI') "CREATE_DATE" FROM REPLY R JOIN MEMBER ON (REPLY_WRITER = USER_NO) WHERE R.STATUS = 'Y' AND BOARD_NO = ? ORDER BY REPLY_NO DESC
